title: Mobile Suit Gundam MS IGLOO 603
original_name: 機動戦士ガンダム MS IGLOO 603
sinopse: Taking place during the One Year War in the year U.C. 0079, MS IGLOO 603 follows the missions of the crew of a former civilian cargo ship Jotunheim, which has been commissioned to become an experimental support ship by the Principality of Zeon to test various prototype weapons for combat use.
